original_title: The Creature From Scroby Sands (The Midnight Hour Presents)
overview: Hosted by the Professor; The Midnight Hour presents 'The Creature From Scroby Sands'.  Fully restored and digitally remastered for todays modern audiences, 'The Creature From Scroby Sands' is a tale of terrifying horror and blood curdling nautical dangers.  Join us for the special preview event only on The Midnight Hour, (The horror anthology show worth staying up for..) as we let loose onto to beach 'The Creature from Scroby Sands' live on KJW Channel 66-6.
title: The Creature From Scroby Sands (The Midnight Hour Presents)
